title: Identified Merit with PaperSelectTM Interview
format: Employees are solicited to give their feedback at a table set up across from the cafeteria.
intent: To interview any adult smoker who has tried or currently smokes the Merit with PaperSelect TM.
introduction: Hi, my name is [Name]. May I have a few minutes?

questions.question: Have you been interviewed the last few days concerning Merit with PaperSelect TM?
What is the brand you currently smoke?
questions.note: If the adult smoker smokes Merit, use the Merit smoker questionnaire.

questions.question: Have you ever tried the Merit with PaperSelect TM?

responses.yes: Use the Tried Merit with PaperSelect TM questionnaire.

eligibility: Only smokers 21 years of age or older are eligible to participate in this research.
requirements: Provide a valid, non-expired government-issued ID as proof of age. If you do not have such an ID or do not sign the registration form, you will NOT be eligible to participate.
